K12D0495_H0465:372b-5: byis pa sdug bsngal bden pa can //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-6: log pa'i zhags pas bcings pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-7: sdug bsngal ba de rnams bltas nas //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-8: de rnams kun la brjod pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-9: 'di skad gsung ni bka' stsal to //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-10: srog med sems can kyang yod min //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-11: byed pa po med gtso bo'ang med //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-12: khyab pa med cing dngos po'ang med //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-13: rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-14: log shes rang bzhin zhags pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-15: srid pa'i 'ching ba rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-16: dngos po thams cad rnam par bral //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-17: sna tshogs ji bzhin rnam bsgoms pas //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-18: dngos po kun las rnam par grol //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-20: phyi rol nang gi khyad par gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-21: de ltar thams cad rnam par bsgom //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-22: dbu ba chu bur dang sgyu ma //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-23: stong nyid 'ba' zhig las ldang ste //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-24: de ltar thams cad rnam bsgoms na //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-25: ye shes go 'phang ngo rnam rtog /
K12D0495_H0465:372b-26: sdig pa'i go cha las grol nas //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-28: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-30: kun mkhyen ye shes zhags pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-31: 'ching ba'i don du rab tu brtag /
K12D0495_H0465:372b-32: gang du phung po khams med cing //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-33: skye mched rnams ni 'byung ba med //
K12D0495_H0465:372b-34: dngos po kun las rnam grol bar //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-1: ba mchog gis rtag tu gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-2: gang du kun gzhi rnam shes med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-3: bdag med gang zag kyang yod min //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-4: sangs rgyas byang chub sa steng 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-5: gang du thams cad sgyu mar gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-6: da ni kun mkhyen mnga' brnyes pa //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-7: sems can don rnams thugs su chud //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-8: cho ga bya ba la zhugs phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-9: bu la ma lus par bshad do //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-10: gang zhig kun gzhi yod pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-11: gal te rnam shes kyang yod pa //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-12: de yi bdag nyid bdag gi bu //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-13: yod do zhes kyang bstan gyur pa //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-14: dngos po'i gdon gyis brlams pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-15: byis pas sdug bsngal rnams mthong nas //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-16: bdag gis gzhug par bya phyir bu //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-17: cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-18: sems can med cing srog kyang med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-19: gang zag med cing byed po'ang med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-20: rnam shes med cing kun gzhi med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-21: gang la bdag med dbang phyug med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-22: skyes bu med cing khyab pa'ang med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-23: gtso bo med cing rgyu yang med //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-24: dngos po kun las rnam grol ba'i //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-25: dam chos dri ma med pa bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-26: de nyid mchog gi gtso bo ste //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-27: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang bsten //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-28: rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-29: byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom; ;gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol bar //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-30: dngos po thams cad rnam par gcad //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-31: phung po khams dang skye mched spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:373a-32: thams cad stong nyid sgyu ma ltar //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-0: byang chub @373b sems ni bsdus pa nyid //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-1: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-2: de ltar yid kyis bsgom par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-3: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nye //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-4: gang zhig sangs rgyas nyid kyi thugs //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-5: bag yod pas ni rtag bsten na //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-6: byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-8: gsang sngags spyod pas gang dag ste //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-9: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sku //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-11: nam mkha' lta bur gos med pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-13: byang chub sems ni bsgoms pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-14: bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab bshad; ;sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-15: 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0495_H0465:373b-17: phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te bcom ldan
K12D0495_H0465:373b-18: 'das la lan gsum bsgor ba byas nas rdo rje'i
K12D0495_H0465:373b-19: skabs su rtol ba blangs te bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0495_H0465:373b-21: ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-22: khyod kyi sras po nga mnyes gshin //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-23: 'di dag shin tu som nyi za //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-24: bdag gis ji ltar rtogs par bgyi //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-25: gang yang byams pa la sogs gzhan //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-26: sa bcu ma lus pa thams cad //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-28: thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-29: gang zhig sems can don ma byas //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-30: bsod nams ye shes rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:373b-31: de rnams la ni thugs brtse'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-2: de ring bdag la ma lus par //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-3: sems can phan par brtson pas gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-4: 'di yi mthu stobs kyang ni ci //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-5: 'di yi pha rol gnon pa ci //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-6: mi g-yo zhes bya'i gtso khyod kyis //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-7: 'dir ni ji ltar yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-9: 'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-11: dkyil 'khor yang ni bshad du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-12: gang gis sa steng 'di thob pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-13: bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-14: gsang sngags kyi ni tshad kyang gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-15: dkyil 'khor yang ni ji ltar lags //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-16: mgon po 'di la the tshom za //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-18: sngags kyi dngos grub de bzhin gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-19: de nyid las kyi dbye ba yang //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-20: mngon spyod kyang ni rab tu bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-21: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dag gis //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-22: mgon pos ji ltar cher myur bar //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-23: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i 'bras bu mchis //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-24: mgon pos bzla ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-25: sa steng 'dir ni de ji ltar //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-26: me thab kyi ni cho ga dang //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-27: de yang tshim dang bsang gtor dang //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-28: khro bo'i rgyal po dang ldan pa //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-29: mgon pos de dag thams cad gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-30: nyi ma gcig gi nyin phyed nas //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-31: zla ba brgyad pa'i skad cig tu //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-32: dngos grub dag ni yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:374a-33: dug gi las kyi gso spyad dang //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-0: rdzas kyi sbyor ba'i las sna @374b tshogs; ;mngon par brjod pa yang dag 'byung //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-1: ma lus pa ni bshad du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-2: gang gis dngos grub thob pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-3: mgon po gzhan ni ma mchis te //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-4: gtso bo khyod spangs gzhan med do; ;byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-5: nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-6: gang yang 'jig rten par grags pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-7: tshangs sogs rdzu 'phrul cher bshad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-8: de rnams kyi yang mgon skyabs ni //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-9: gtso bo khyod spangs gzhan ma mchis //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-10: de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12D0495_H0465:374b-11: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pas slar yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa /
K12D0495_H0465:374b-12: chos kyi rgyal po sngags kyi sgo //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-16: gsang sngags spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-17: gang gis bcom ldan nyid kyis gzigs //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-18: chos kyi dga' bde thob pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-19: sa gzhi'i steng na rnam par gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-20: gsang sngags mnyes par rab brtson zhing //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-21: mthong ba'i chos la bde thob pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-22: sems can sa steng gnas pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-24: thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thob //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-25: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-26: gsang sngags rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-28: sdang ba'i srin po thams cad dang //
K12D0495_H0465:374b-29: 'byung po gdon dang sha za dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-2: sems can rnams la gnod bshad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-3: gsang sngags stobs chen dran pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-5: sa steng sems can ma rungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-6: rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-7: de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-8: rtog pa 'di ni rab tu gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-9: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-10: grul bum dang ni lus sul po //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-11: smyo byed rgyu skar thams cad dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-12: ma rungs gza' sogs bshad pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-13: sems can sdig can de rnams la //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-14: khro bo 'di ni rab tu gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-15: tshangs sogs gdon gyi tshogs kun dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-16: de bzhin rgyal po nyan thos dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-17: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-18: gang zhig bshad par mi nus shing //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-19: de dag thams cad thal bar rlogs //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-20: gsang sngags bzlas pa rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-21: snying la gnas pa yang dag bsam //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-22: gsang sngags zhes bya mthong dka' zhing //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-23: ma lus pa ru thal bar brlags //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-24: tshangs pa la sogs dkyil 'khor dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-25: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-26: dbang po'i gnas bcu bdag po yis //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-27: 'di ni bzod par mi nus te //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-28: khro bo'i rgyal po rol pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-29: sdang ba'i sems can ci nas kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-30: ras bal 'da' ba mtshungs par brtag /
K12D0495_H0465:375a-31: ming nas bos pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:375a-33: de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-0: gsang sngags @375b 'di ru bzlas pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-1: rtag par rgyun du dran par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-2: gsang sngags dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-3: thams cad du ni 'jigs med par //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-4: sngags gnas sa steng 'di ru bya //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-5: gsang sngags mgon po dran pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-6: 'chang ba dang ni rtag tu zlos //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-7: me yi nang du gnas pa na //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-8: mche ba gtsigs pa yi ni skus //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-10: mtho ris them skas lta bur dga'//
K12D0495_H0465:375b-12: rgyal po chen pos 'jigs pa sel //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-13: chom rkun gseb tu chud pa na //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-14: seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sku //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-15: khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-16: de yis rtag tu dran par byas //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-17: rims dang so mig gzer zug dang //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-18: rked pa'i rtsibs logs lus las byung //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'byung ba'i //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-20: sa steng lus can nad rnams ni //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-21: gsang sngags dran pa tsam nyid kyis //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-22: de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-23: khro rgyal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-24: mthu dang stobs ni rtul phod pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-25: kun mkhyen las gzhan sa steng na //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-26: rtag tu bzod gnas su zhig yod //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-27: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mthu stobs ni //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-28: ji ltar smra bar mi nus pa //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-29: de bzhin khro rgyal bsgyings pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-30: brjod par yang ni mi nus so //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-31: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba yi; ;yon tan mi yis bgrang mi nus //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-32: de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po yi //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-33: stobs ni brjod par mi nus so //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-34: rdo rje padma'i rigs zhes pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:375b-35: khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-2: bka' nyan pho nya rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-3: de rnams kyis ni khro bo 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-4: 'khor los bsgyur zhes mngon par brjod //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-5: khro bo'i rgyal po blo ldan gyi //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-6: mthu stobs de ltar bshad pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dpa' gcig 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-8: de yi dpa' bo zhes su bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-9: gang gsungs bden pa'i tshig gyur pas //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-10: mi slu ba ni nyid yin no //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-11: de phyir 'di ni mi g-yo bas //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-12: mi g-yo ba zhes mngon par brjod //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-13: mi g-yo ba yi sa thob pa //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-14: bsam gtan rtse gcig blo yi gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-15: nyan thos sa la sogs pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-16: bdud rnams kun gyis mi g-yo ba; ;des na mgon pos mtshan gsol to //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /
K12D0495_H0465:376a-18: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-20: gang yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-21: gang yang de bzhin ma byon pa //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-22: mgon po da ltar bzhugs pa gang //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-23: 'gro la phan phyir cho ga ni //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-24: de dag kun gyis 'di gsungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-25: sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya bar bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-26: sems can khams ni thams cad kyi //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-27: bstan pa gang yin srung bar mdzad //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-29: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-30: gang yang gsang sngags grangs med pa //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-31: sems can phan 'dogs bzhugs par gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-32: lag na rdo rje blo ldan pa //
K12D0495_H0465:376a-33: 'di dag thams cad yang dag bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-0: mi gang sdig pas @376b bsgribs med kyi //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-1: sems can snang ba skyed par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-2: mi phyed pa yi zhags par bcings //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-4: khro bo'i rgyal po blo dang ldan //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-5: sngags pas ma bsgrubs par yang 'grub //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-6: khro bo'i rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-8: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag
K12D0495_H0465:376b-9: ngo mtshar te dga' zhing mig rgyas pas mgrin gcig
K12D0495_H0465:376b-10: dang / ngag gcig tu tshig snyan pos gsol pa /
K12D0495_H0465:376b-11: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-12: thabs dang shes rab bsam du med //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-13: thugs rjer gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-14: mtshungs med dam tshig bshad du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-16: sa steng thams cad 'jigs med cing //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-17: gang gis gus chen rang bzhin gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:376b-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0495_H0465:376b-20: lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
K12D0495_H0465:376b-22: khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam

K12D0495_H0465:410b-19: ma ra ma ra ha sv'ah'a /
K12D0495_H0465:410b-20: ma mo rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-21: na ma:sarb'a s'a pa ri p'u ra ke bhya:/
K12D0495_H0465:410b-22: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0495_H0465:410b-24: aom ha na ha na badzra h'um phat/
K12D0495_H0465:410b-28: sarba bighna da ma da ma /
K12D0495_H0465:410b-29: sarba dushtan aom h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0495_H0465:410b-30: thun mong gi ni tsham ngam du //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-32: phyag rgya rnams ni ma lus dang //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-33: sngags ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-34: don kun grub par byed pa'i sngags //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-35: 'di ni myur du grub byed cing //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-36: bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras stsol pa //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-37: shin tu gsang ba yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-38: phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-39: dri dang me tog bdug pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-40: gtor ma yang ni ma lus pa //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-41: sus kyang gzhom par mi nus so //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-42: phyogs bcing ba dang de nas gza'//
K12D0495_H0465:410b-44: de kun sngags dang bcas pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:410b-46: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-2: khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par shul //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-3: 'di ni khyod la rjes su sbyin //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-4: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-5: de bzhin mngon spyod dbang du bya //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-6: de bzhin sna tshogs gyur pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-7: khyod la rag yum mchog tu 'dod //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-8: bsod nams du ma las 'khrungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-9: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos 'bar //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-10: mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs; ;phyag brkyang ba ni sngon 'gro bas //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-11: bdag gis rdzogs sangs rgyas dbang bskur //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-12: bde gshegs las 'khrungs rdo rje can //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-13: zab mo dbyangs kyi sgra yis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-14: bde bar gshegs pas kun gsungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-15: khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga'i rim //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-16: rim pa ji bzhin gsungs pa nyid //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-17: khyod nyid gcig tu brtan g-yo ba'i //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-18: snyan pa dag ni srung bar gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-19: dam pa'i chos ni sbrul pa'i sku //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-20: sa steng na ni zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar ni //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-22: sa steng khyod nyid gcig pu gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-23: 'das dang ma byon par gyur dang //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-24: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-25: kha lo sgyur ba khyod gcig bu //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-28: slar yang phyag rgyar bzhag pas kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-29: dbang chen thams cad g-yos nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-30: sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu bskyod //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-31: de dag thams cad mngon gyur te //
K12D0495_H0465:411a-32: sangs rgyas dam chos bsam med pas //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang @411b 'thob; ;sa steng rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag /
K12D0495_H0465:411b-1: nam mkha' mdzod kyi 'od zer thob //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-2: 'phags pa chen po rmad byung che //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-3: 'jig rten yang dag byung gyur te //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-4: sa gzhi snying po 'di ru yin //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-5: de nas bcom ldan rgyal gyur pas //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-6: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-7: brtan dang g-yo ba'i gsang ba rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-8: snyan pa'i gsung gi bka' stsal pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-9: khyod ni bdag gis tshim par byas; ;bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'chang //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-10: rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-11: bdag nyid chen pos de nyid bya //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhi ba //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-13: chos kyi dbyings la mchog tu gzhol //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-14: chos nyid gcig pu thugs chud nas //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-15: kun mkhyen cang mi gsung bar 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-16: de nas 'khor rnams thams cad kyis //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-17: ngo mtshar ba yi tshig gsol pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-18: sangs rgyas che ba bsam mi khyab; ;'jig rten mgon pos bstan pa nyid //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-19: deng nas bzung ste bdag cag kun //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-20: rtag pa gcig pu mthar phyin 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-21: bdag nyid chen po'i rdo rje can //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-22: bde bar gshegs pas gtad par gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-23: 'khor rnams shin tu dga' ba yis //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-24: snyan pa yi ni tshig smras pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-25: skal pa chen po mchog tu gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-26: ci bgyi yi ni bka' bsgo stsol //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-27: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-28: me tog phreng bar gyur pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-29: thugs rjer ldan pa'i shugs kyis su //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-30: 'khor rnams la ni bka' stsal pa //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-31: khro rgyal ras ris cho ga ni //
K12D0495_H0465:411b-32: rdzu 'phrul chen po de nyon cig /
K12D0495_H0465:412a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-3: sngags kyi sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-4: don ni de nas thob par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-5: sngags pa 'chang bar gyur pa dkon //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-6: lus can rnams kyis bzod mi nus //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-7: gdug pa log par 'dren pa kun //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-8: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can srin po rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-9: ring po nas ni ring mi mthong //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-10: dpa' po dregs pa bcom pa bzhin //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-11: nad rnams thams cad rnam par grol //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-12: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-13: thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-14: gang zhig lag pa'i nang du 'thob //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-15: rgyu skar med cing gza' sogs med //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-16: ma mo med cing lha yang med //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-17: 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol bar //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-19: sems can thams cad dbang thob cing //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-20: sa steng sngags shes rgyal po ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-21: 'khor bcas kyis mchod snyan par smra //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-22: ras bris mthong ba shin tu gsang //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-23: skra dang bral ba de brtags pa'i; ;dpa' bos btsongs pa'i ras blangs te //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-24: dri dkar chu yis bkrus nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-25: kun da zla ba lta bur gtsang //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-26: ji srid ngur smrig mdzes pa ru //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-27: slar yang byed du gzhug par bya; ;bdug pa yi ni bdug par mdzes //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-28: thams cad du ni gtsang sbra bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-29: de nas de ltar byas nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-30: sa gzhi rab tu byug par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412a-31: de la yang ni dri zhim spos //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-0: shin tu @412b mdzes par byug par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-1: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-2: rnga dang dril bu sgra snyan mchog /
K12D0495_H0465:412b-3: rgyu skar nyi ma bzang po la //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-4: rtse ba'i sngags ni rab bsngags pa //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-5: yid du 'ong ba'i bum pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-6: dri yi chu yis rab bkang nas //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-7: sngags pas cho ga bzhin du gzhag /
K12D0495_H0465:412b-8: zhal zas gtor ma cho ga bzhin //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-9: de ltar 'di kun byas pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-10: rgya che bar ni byas pa'i char //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-11: rol mo'i las ni legs bslabs pas //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-12: skal pa chen po de ru 'bod //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-13: de nas gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-14: byang chub sems ni khyad du 'ong //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-15: skal pa chen po de mchod bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-16: gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-17: de ni yang dag par mchod nas //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-18: de nas shin tu dben pa ru //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-19: de nas blo ldan thig gdab bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-20: ras kyis kha nas g-yogs par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-21: kha tshar dang bcas ring por gzhag /
K12D0495_H0465:412b-22: blo ldan de dbus bri ba ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-23: khro bo shin tu mthong dka' ba //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-24: lto ba che la shin tu khro //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-25: lag 'gro'i bdag po phyag bzhi pa //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-26: zhal ni rnam 'gyur zur gyis gzigs //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-28: mche ba gtsigs shing shin tu 'jigs //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-29: sprin phung gtibs pa lta bu'i 'od //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-31: gsum pa du ba lta bu'o //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-32: gar mdzad h'um sgrog par byung ba //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-33: klu yi 'od kyis tshogs rang bzhin //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-34: thod pa rlon pa'i phreng ba ni //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-35: tshar bzhi lta bur bltas pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:412b-36: 'jigs pa chen po'i dbu la brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-2: me stag dang bcas me 'od kyis //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-3: rdo rje g-yas kyi phyag na 'o //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-5: ral gri gnyis pa na ni bsnams //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-6: g-yon pa yis ni zhags pa bsnams //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-7: gnyis pa yis ni sdigs mdzub mdzad //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-8: sku la sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-9: nor rgyas bu yis ska rags byas //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-10: thod pa rlon pa'i phreng ba yis //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-11: mchod phyir thogs su spras pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-12: dpa' bo na bza' dur smrig mnabs //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-13: rin chen rdo ba'i steng du ni //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-14: g-yas brkyangs ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-15: 'og tu bgegs ni bri bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-17: myog po ru ni gyur pa'o //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-18: rtsa dang rgyu ma rnam par 'byung //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-19: khrag 'dzag lta bur gnas pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-20: 'og tu blo ldan sgrub pa po //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-21: bus mo dag ni sa la btsugs //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-22: sbos kyi snod kyis brel ba'i bdag /
K12D0495_H0465:413a-23: mchod yon snod ni 'dzin par brtson //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-24: 'di ni ras bris rab mchog tu //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-25: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-26: ras bris 'di yis de ma thag /
K12D0495_H0465:413a-27: sngags pa'i ma grub pa yang 'grub //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-28: khro bo'i rgyal po ngo mtshar ba //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-29: thams cad gdung byed yang dag bri //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-30: shes rab chen pos ri mo mkhan //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-31: ston mo drangs te yon yang sbyin //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-32: pir ni gsar ba'i mtshan ma dang //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-33: rdza mkhan snod ni gsar ba ste //
K12D0495_H0465:413a-34: mtshan ma bye brag byed pa'o //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-0: yang na thams @413b cad 'byung ba yin //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-1: de ltar thams cad gyur bltas nas //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-2: dri yi ras kyis gdab par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-3: sa steng shin tu gsang ba ste //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-4: su la'ang bstan par mi bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-5: gang gis khro bo 'di mthong ba //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-7: skye bo nad kyis 'khrigs nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-8: de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-9: sngags pa dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-10: rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-11: sngags pas rtag tu ras bris 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-12: rtag par rgyun du bsrung bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-13: sngags kyi slob dpon dag gis bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-15: 'di rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i; ;yon tan rab tu sgrub par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-16: sa steng dkyil 'khor rtsa ba'i sngags //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-17: yon tan gnas su gyur pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-18: de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-19: gsang sngags ma lus bsam mi khyab; ;bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu 'byung //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-20: gsang sngags sku can khro bo 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-21: bcom ldan thub pa zhes ni bya //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-22: khro bo'i rgyal po blo ldan gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-23: gsang sngags 'di ni bklags pas 'grub; ;khro rgyal 'di ni bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-24: sngags kyang bsam gyis mi khyab 'dod //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-26: bklags pas 'grub par gsungs pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-27: sngags pa bdag gis mi nus so //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-28: sngags pa blo dang ldan pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-29: gal te mtshan med lnga byas kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-30: skye bo de yis bsam pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:413b-31: yongs su rdzogs par byed ba yin //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-2: rtag tu mngon par sbyangs gyur na //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-4: ras ris gnyis par gyur pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-5: bshad kyi phan pa'i sems kyis nyon //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-6: yon tan rgya che bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-8: dur smrig ras ni blangs nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-9: dri yi chu yis yongs su dgang //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-10: chos grangs med cing rgyu skar med //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-11: gso sbyong smyung ba la sogs med //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-12: ri mo mkhan bzang btsal nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-13: mkhas pas ri mo bri bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-14: sangs rgyas mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-15: ting nge 'dzin gnas rims bral pa //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-16: 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur ba'i sku //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-18: byang chub dpag bsam shing dang ni; ;gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnam par brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-19: logs su 'dab chags rgyal po ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-20: snyim pa me tog gis bkang bya //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-21: g-yas na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-22: thub pa chen po 'jig rten gtso //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-23: sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-24: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-25: thal mo sbyar te 'dud pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-26: rtag tu bzhugs pa blta bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-27: g-yon gyi drung na bzhugs pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-28: snyems tshul dang bcas zhal bzhad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-29: g-yas kyi phyag gis spyi bor ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414a-31: dpa' bo chen po cod pan can //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-0: rgyan rnams @414b kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-1: ras bris cha yi mtshan ma ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-2: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-3: 'og tu khro bo mi g-yo ba //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-4: ral gri zhags pas rnam par brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-5: rdo ba dmar po'i gdan steng na //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-6: 'od zer tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-8: mchu yis mchu mnan zur mig gzigs //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-9: bgegs kun sreg par sgrub pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-11: sgrub pa po ni dngos song lta //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-12: spos kyi khang bu lag na thogs //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-13: pus mo gnyis ni yang dag btsugs //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-14: rgyal ba'i sras la sems song ba; ;de yi 'og tu khro bo gtso //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-15: khams gsum brtan par rnam par gnon //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-16: bka' gnang ba yi lam gyur cing //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-18: rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin dang //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-19: sdong bu rgyas la ze bar bcas //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-20: 'dzin pa'i klu yi bu mo ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa lta bur 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-22: padma dkar po mgon po ni //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-23: 'jig rten gtso bo thugs rje'i bdag /
K12D0495_H0465:414b-24: padma dmar po yang dag bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-25: bde gshegs las byung rdo rje can //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-26: de ltar 'di bdag kun byas pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-27: ras bris rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-28: ras bris 'di ni mthong ba yis; ;sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-30: ngan song rnams ni rgyun chad 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:414b-31: thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thob //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-1: gza' rnams kun gyis bzung ba dang //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-2: nad rnams kun gyis nyen pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-3: 'jigs pa kun gyis 'dir zin rnams; ;cho ga mthong bas grol bar 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-4: sems can kun la brtse bar gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-5: sems can thams cad dbang du byed //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-6: thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thob //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-7: rtag tu ras bris blta bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-8: rtag tu bag yod par gyur nas //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-9: gtsang zhing tshul khrims rnam par brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-10: ras bris yang dag mchod byas nas //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-11: de yi tshe na sangs rgyas thob //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-12: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen bdag /
K12D0495_H0465:415a-13: thugs ni rnal 'byor gcig pur bzhugs //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-14: sems can bde ba ster ba yis //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-15: 'dod par gyur pa'i rtog pa gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-16: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-17: dbang du bya dang mngon spyod des //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-18: las 'di mdo ru bsdus nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-19: sngags bas sa steng dkyil 'khor du //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-20: ras bris sgrub par 'dod ba ni //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-21: rdzu 'phrul che de rtag tu nyon //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-22: dpa' bo gcig gi bdag nyid che //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-23: gtso bo bstan pa'i don mdzad pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-24: lus can kun la gsungs pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-25: de yi rtog pa yang dag bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-26: mgon po 'phral du las mdzad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-27: rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-28: rgyal po ngan par bshad pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-29: bstan la gnod pa byed pa can //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-30: de rnams brlag par bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:415a-31: khro bo 'di ni rab tu sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-0: gang yang 'di ru gsungs @415b pa gzhan //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-1: bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-2: gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dang //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-3: lha sogs mi 'am ci bcas pa //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-4: de rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-5: khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-6: nad rnams thams cad rnam par grol //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-9: gdug pa'i sems can bdud rnams la //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-10: khro bo'i rgyal po rab sbyar na; ;bsam mi khyab pa'i stobs gnon to //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-11: bskrad pa dang ni gsod pa nyid //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-13: rtag tu smyo bar byed pa la //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-14: 'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-15: mgon po'i ras bris mchog gang gi /
K12D0495_H0465:415b-16: lag tu chud par gyur pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-17: de ni sa steng snying po ru //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-19: de tshe dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-20: phyag rgya'i las ni rnam par sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-21: gus pas 'dzin pa'i sngags pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-22: gtsang zhing ngang tshul rnam par brgyan //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-23: bla ma mnyes pa yang dag byed //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-24: cho ga'i rim pa yon phul ba //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-25: gsang sngags gang yang rung bzung nas //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-26: phyag rgya sbyin pa yongs su bzung //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-27: bla ma la ni rjes gnang thob //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-28: sa steng sgrub pa brtson par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-29: dur khrod dang ni ri bo'i rtse //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-30: lam gyi bzhi mdo'am mtshan ma gcig /
K12D0495_H0465:415b-31: gang du yid ni nyams dga' ba'i //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-32: gnas de nyid du brtsam par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-33: slong mo gcig bu'i zas za 'am //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-34: yang na rtsa ba 'bras sogs za //
K12D0495_H0465:415b-35: dben zhing ca co med pa'i sar //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-2: 'bum phrag yongs su rdzogs nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-3: aa pa marga'i yam shing sogs //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-4: mngar gsum dang ni ldan par bsreg /
K12D0495_H0465:416a-5: 'bum phrag gcig tu tshang ba na //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-6: de nas zla ba nya yi ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-7: dus tshigs kyi ni sngon du bsdad //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-8: sgrub thabs 'di ni rtogs pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-9: srung ba'i cho ga tshul bzhin bya //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-10: ral gri la sogs mtshon cha gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-11: yang na gang yang rung ba gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-12: der gnas 'di ni rab tu zhugs //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-13: sgrub pa po yi gang zag bzhugs //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-14: nam phyed sgra ni byung ba na //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-15: ras bris mdun du bzhugs su gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-16: gsang sngags bzlas te thun bzhag la //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-17: 'di ni nang gi rnam dag gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-18: de nas de yi mtshan ma ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-20: snyan pa'i rnga yi sgra mang dang //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-21: yang na me tog char du dbab //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-22: gnas su lha yi bu 'ongs te //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-23: sna tshogs rnga yi sgra dang yang //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-24: mi 'am cis ni rnam brgyan pa //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-25: glu ni snyan par len par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-26: char pas brgya byin la sogs lha //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-28: me tog gi ni char yang 'bebs //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-29: 'dud cing shin tu bka' stsol zhu //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-30: rig pa 'dzin pas me tog gi //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-31: char bas sa steng khebs par phab //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-32: sna tshogs rnga yi sgra dag ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-33: rab tu bde zhing yid 'phrog pa //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-34: sa steng de ru kun khengs par //
K12D0495_H0465:416a-35: glu snyan pa yi sgra yang len //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-0: byang chub sems dpa' @416b chen po'i bdag /
K12D0495_H0465:416b-1: sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-2: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-3: thugs rje can bdag bka' stsol te //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-4: dpa' bo chen po bu khyod legs //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-5: srid pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par rgal //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-6: bu khyod bla med go 'phang ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-7: rtul phod pa yi gnas thob pa'o //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-8: byang chub sems dpa' mnyam nyid 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-10: bu khyod sangs rgyas thams cad de //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-11: skyon rnams thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-12: de nas shar gyi phyogs cha ru //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-13: grangs med du ma'i tshad gyur pa //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-14: lha yi bzhon pa'i me tog ldan //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-15: slar yang de yi mdun na gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-16: rin chen gdu bu'i dra ba ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-17: phyogs kun tu ni kun tu gtibs //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-18: mu tig gi ni chun 'phyang can //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-19: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan spras //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-20: rin chen sna tshogs rang bzhin gdugs //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-21: nyi ma lta bur snang bar byed //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-22: steng du rin chen bla bre yis //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-23: ri bo'i phyogs dang mnyam par phub //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-24: bye ba du ma'i rig 'dzin ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-25: kun kyang lhab lhub rgyan gyis spras //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-26: kun nas yongs su bskor nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-27: de yi mdun du mod la gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-28: sngags pa dngos grub 'dod pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-29: phyag na rdo rje dpal dang ldan //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-30: de ni myur bar bzlas par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-31: rdzu 'phrul chen po byon gyi bar //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-32: bdag nyid chen po der byon nas //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-34: sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu g-yos //
K12D0495_H0465:416b-35: sa gzhi me tog gcal du 'grem //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-2: sa steng rab tu zhim por 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-3: phyogs bzhi ru ni rnga yi sgra //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-4: rol mo la sogs bsdus pa 'byung //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-5: ha ha zhes sgrog sgra chen po //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-6: sgra ni phyogs bcur thos par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-7: der byon bdag nyid chen po la //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-8: yid ni dad par gyur pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-9: mchod yon zhabs bsil brjod nas dbul //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-10: dri dang me tog rim ji bzhin //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-11: de nas myur bar brjod bya ba //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-12: legs par 'ongs so brjod par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-13: sdig pa'i dgra yis zin pa na //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-14: dpa' bo chen po bdag sdug bsngal //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-15: mgon khyod bdag la brtse bar mdzod; ;de nas bdag nyid chen po 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-16: phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-17: sngags pa blo dang ldan pa la //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-18: snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-19: dpa' bo chen po bu khyod legs //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-20: rnyed par dka' ba khyod kyis mthong //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-21: khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-22: bu khyod kyis ni 'di bsgrubs pas //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-23: shin tu sdug bsngal lang long 'khrigs //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-24: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las khyod rgal //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-25: slar yang skye ba'i 'jigs pa med //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-27: rdzogs sangs rgyas sems can mnyes gshin pa //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-28: bdag nyid chen po rnams mthong ba; ;phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i mgon //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-29: rtag tu dam chos gsung bar 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-30: de ltar rig nas 'di yi ni //
K12D0495_H0465:417a-31: bdag nyid lag pa nas bzung ste //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-0: bdag nyid chen po'i @417b bzhon pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-1: bsam med yon tan kun 'byung ba //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-2: skyon de gnas par gyur nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-3: sngags shes ci tsam 'dod kyi bar //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-4: sangs rgyas zhing rnams ston par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-5: sems dpa' bsod nams nyer 'tsho bas //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-6: de tsam tsham tsom med par 'gro //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-7: de nas de tshe che ba'i bdag /
K12D0495_H0465:417b-8: lha yi bzhon pa mdzas pa la //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-9: de ru bskyon par gyur nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-10: de nas rdo rje can gyur pa //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-11: mi g-yo rdzu 'phrul che ldan tshim //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-12: de nas lha yi bzhon pa bcibs //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-13: rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs kyis bskor //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-14: glu chen rnga yi sgra dang ni //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-15: rig pa 'dzin pa'i glu sgra sgrog /
K12D0495_H0465:417b-16: bye ba du ma bsam med pa'i; ;rig pa 'dzin pa'i mkha' lding gis //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-17: de yi tshe na bskor nas 'gro //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-18: 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing rnams su //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-19: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-20: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mkha' lding yin; ;bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan brnyes //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-21: bskal pa grangs med pa ru 'tsho //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-22: nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-23: dpal ldan gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-24: blo bzang gis ni kun spyad na //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-25: sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med na //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-26: mchod gnas 'di ni snang bar byed //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-27: bsam med pa yi dam chos nyan //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-28: blo ldan gang zhig thos gyur pas //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-29: sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med 'byung //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-30: khro bo'i rgyal po blo ldan pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-31: dngos grub 'di ni yang dag bshad //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-32: gzhan yang gzhan la ci rigs par //
K12D0495_H0465:417b-33: mtshungs med bsrung bar bya de nyon //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-2: bsam gyis mi khyab grangs med las //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyed kyis mkhyen //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-4: sh'akya zhes bya bas ni gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-5: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-6: dbang dang mngon spyod de bzhin du //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-7: ras bris gnyis par tshul bzhin du //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-8: ji ltar rigs par bya ba yis //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-9: ras bris gnyis pa 'di yis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-10: rgyal bas sgrub thabs gang gsungs pa; ;gal te sa stong sgrub byed na //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-11: 'di ni nyid du cho gas bsgrubs //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-12: sgrub thabs cho ga bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-13: 'di ni bsam mi khyab pas gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-14: 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-15: rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mchog gis gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-16: tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-17: 'di la smyung bar gnas pa med //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-18: lhag ma lhag ma min yang rung //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-19: slar yang 'bad pas bsgrub par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-20: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas brjod na //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-21: mtshams med lnga byas sngags pas kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-22: las rnams thams cad kun nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-23: bdag nyid rgyal ba'i skyes mchog 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-24: gso spyad la sogs dur bas bya //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-25: yang na brjod de btab pas so //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-26: rims sogs nad kyis btab pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-27: gdug pa rnams gso byed pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-28: nad rnams kun gyis zin pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-29: gza' kun gyis ni rab gzir ba //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-30: ras bris spyan sngar rab bzhag ste //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-31: khro bo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa'o //
K12D0495_H0465:418a-32: bum pa chu yis yongs bkang nas //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-0: @418b nad kyis btab pa'i mi khrus bya //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-1: mchog tu bde ba sbyin pa na //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-2: de rnams rnal mar sos par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-3: sa steng gdon gyis zin pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-4: sbyin sreg dag ni yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-5: dur ba mngar gsum gyis btags pa //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-6: gdon rnams zhi phyir sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-7: srin po yang ni bshad pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-9: sha za dang ni grul bum dang //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-10: ma mo rdzu 'phrul che gsungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-11: gzhan yang gdug pa byed pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-12: sa steng sems can 'tshe byed gang //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-13: de rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-14: khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-15: nad rnams dang ni don dag la; ;sman gyi shing gi yam shing ni //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-16: aa ru skyu ru la sogs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-17: sbyin sreg 'di ni rab tu sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-18: rgyal srid thob par 'dod pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-19: sa gzhi'i steng na gnas pa gang //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-20: de yi cho ga 'di ni mchog /
K12D0495_H0465:418b-21: padma'i cho ga sbyin sreg rim //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-23: mngar gsum gyis btags 'dod pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-24: ras bris sbyan sngar sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-25: rgyal po 'dod par gyur pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-26: cho ga yang dag tshul bzhin bya //
K12D0495_H0465:418b-27: blon po thob par 'dod na ni //

K12D0495_H0465:427a-11: dgra bo'i ming ni bri bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-12: dug dag khrag ni yang dag ldan //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-13: de yis rtag tu dgra bo bri //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-14: che ba gsum dang lan tshva nyid //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-15: khrag gis gang par dgang bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-16: de ru ming ni bcug nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-17: skra yis yongs su bri bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-18: nim pa'i me la yungs mar gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-19: cung zhig tsam du btso bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-21: rang gi lha ru gyur pa gang //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-22: khams gsum pa yi bdag po yis //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-23: the tshom med par thal bar rlog /
K12D0495_H0465:427a-24: gdug pa'i sems can lta ci smos //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-25: rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po yang //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-26: rang byung bas ni bsrungs gyur kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-27: de dag thams cad brlag par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-28: sbyor ba 'di la brten nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-29: thugs rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-30: bstan pa yi ni don byed par //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-31: sa steng 'dir ni the tshom med //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-32: yang dag bsam mi khyab pa 'di //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-33: khro bo'i rgyal pos rnam par 'phrul //
K12D0495_H0465:427a-34: rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-0: thugs rje'i ro la @427b gnas pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-1: bstan pa dag ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-2: dam chos 'di ni sbyar bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-3: nim pa'i 'bras bu yang dag blangs //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-4: de nas tsha ba gsum gyis dgang //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-5: khyad par nim pa'i 'dab ma la //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-6: dgra bo'i ming ni bris nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-7: lnga yi bdag nyid yang dag blangs //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-8: de tshe cho ga bzhin me sbar //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-9: yungs mar gyis ni bkang byas te //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-10: thod pa dang ni dug nyid kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-11: gang du cung zad gnas nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-12: bcug ste sngags pas btso bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-13: dgra bo de yi mod du 'chi //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-14: yul 'khor phyugs bcas de bzhin no //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-15: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-16: dug dang rlung dang skye gnas nas //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-17: mu ge dang ni yul 'pho dang //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-18: rlung gi char dbab kun tu 'khrigs //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-19: srin po 'byung po'i tshogs kun gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-20: sa steng kun tu khengs par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-21: gsang sngags 'chang ba ma gtogs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-22: cung zad skyob pa yod pa min //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-23: snying rje'i sems ni bskyed nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-24: 'gro ba gzir ba la bltas te //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-25: nyi shu rtsa gcig 'o ma yi //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-26: dgang blugs de tshe dbul bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-27: sngags pa'i bka' drin bzang po yis //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-28: de yi tshe ni zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-29: sngags pa blo ldan ma mnyes na //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-30: gzhan du zhi bar ga la 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-31: sngags kyi dngos grub bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-32: yang dag sbyor ba 'di sbyar na //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-33: bstan pa bsrung ba'i don phyir dang //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-34: gdug pa rnams ni gzhom phyir dang //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-35: rgyal po'am ni gdug pa can //
K12D0495_H0465:427b-36: bstan la gnod pa byed pa rnams //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-1: rnams tshar gcad pa yi phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-2: shin tu 'grub par byed pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-3: yang dag 'di ni rab sbyar na //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-4: de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-5: mi rus dug gi phye ma dang //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-6: khyi yi rus pa nyid dag dang //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-7: de bzhin ske tshe rgod rus dang //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-8: yungs mar sbrul gyi shubs de bzhin //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-9: nim pa yang dag lnga bdag nyid //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-10: rgya skyegs lan tshva nyid dag ste //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-11: 'di dag thams cad gcig bsdus nas //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-12: tsher ma'i me ni mi bzad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-13: bdag nyid khro bo me lta bus //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-14: sreg blugs gsum ni bsreg par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-16: nad rnams mang pos kun tu 'khrigs //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-17: bu phyugs gnyen du bcas pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-18: rgyal po'ang brlag par 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-19: rgyal po gdug pa'i sems ldan pa //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-20: sngags pa la ni 'tshe ba ni //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-21: sbyor ba 'di ni rab brtsams na //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-22: sngags pa med du yang dag 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-23: tsha ba gsum dang lan tshva dug /
K12D0495_H0465:428a-24: ske tshe bsregs pa nyid dang ni //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-25: tsha ba tsha ba'i mar dang yang //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-26: rgya skyegs khu ba sbrul gyi shubs //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-27: 'di rnams gcig tu byas nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-28: de yi tshe na gzugs brnyan bya //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-29: tsha ba yis ni kun tu dgang //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-30: tsha ba'i me ni yang dag ldan //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-31: de nyid la ni ming bris nas //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-32: mi bzad me la bsregs gyur na //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-33: dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-34: gang tshe sngags pa ltos med na //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-35: gzhan du dug gi mtshan ma dang //
K12D0495_H0465:428a-36: yang na mi bzad phol mig dang //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-0: nad chen pos ni kun @428b tu dkrigs //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-2: mes bsregs char pa chen po 'bab //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-3: de nas rdo rje thogs nas kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-4: nad chen rtag pa'i rims kyis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-5: bu dang phyugs dang gnyen du bcas //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-7: sngags pa zhe ba nag pas so //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-8: gang tshe slar yang mnyes nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-9: thugs rje gtad pa'i sems gyur na //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-10: nad kun las ni rnam grol bar //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-11: sa steng de ma thag tu 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-12: gdug pa'i las ni mdor bsdus pa //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-13: ngo mtshar can 'di yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-14: sa steng snying po 'di sngags pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-15: myur ba'i las ni yang dag bshad; ;ting 'dzin yul ni bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-16: rdzu 'phrul yul yang bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-17: pha rol gnon pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-18: rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-19: kun kyang bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-20: yon tan 'di ni su yis nus //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-21: yon tan rmad du byung ba ste //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-22: ji srid sems ni spyod gyur pa //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-23: de srid las ni bsdus pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-24: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che; ;rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis kun tu gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-25: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-26: de bzhin dbang du bya ba'i las //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-27: rgyud gzhan las kyang gsungs pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-28: de dag thams cad 'di ru byed //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-29: ji srid de ru gsang sngags ni //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-30: sa steng dkyil 'khor de gsungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-31: de kun rtog pa'i rgyal po ni //
K12D0495_H0465:428b-33: zhi ba 'o ma dur ba yi //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-2: dkar gsum mngar ram sbyin sreg gam //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-3: 'bras bu nyid kyang mnyam gzhag pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-4: gzhan yang 'bras bu'i tshul dang ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-5: yang na 'o ma can gyi shing //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-6: so ba 'bru ni de bzhin no //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-7: rin chen sna tshogs las byung ba //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-8: las kyi khyad par cho ga ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-9: zhi bar gang zhig rab bsgrags pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-10: me thab de bzhin bdag nyid dang //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-11: gang zhig gnas ni rab tu grags //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-12: zhi ba'i las rnams gsungs pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-13: phyogs ni gang zhig yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-14: gang zhig yam shing gsungs pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-15: tshad ni gang zhig rab tu grags; ;gzhan yang gang zhig rab grags pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-16: de dag thams cad 'di ru bya //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-17: de la zhi ba nyid 'di ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-18: de dag thams cad 'di ru sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-19: gang zhig dbang gyur bshad pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-20: las ni dbye ba'ang de nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-21: me thab ji bzhin bdag nyid dang //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-22: phyogs kyi cha'am yang na gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-23: cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'khrigs //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-24: gzhan du gang zhig gsungs pa yi //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-25: bdag nyid chen po dbang gi las //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-26: dngos grub 'dod pa'i sngags pa yis //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-27: de dag thams cad de ru sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-28: rdzogs sangs sems can mnyes gshin pas //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-29: rgyas pa yang ni yang dag gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-30: cho ga sna tshogs zas dang ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-31: sna tshogs las ni legs sbyar ba //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-32: phyogs kyi khyad par gsungs pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:429a-33: de nas yang ni me yi thab //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-0: gzhan yang cung zad @429b gyi gsungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-1: byang chub snying po sogs gsungs pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-2: bdag nyid rnyed pa legs 'tsho ba //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-3: de dag thams cad rgyas par sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-4: 'di kun yang dag bshad pa ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-5: khro bo'i rgyal po'i rnam 'phrul yin //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-6: sa bcu gnas kyi dbang phyug dang //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-7: gang yang sus kyang mi nus pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-8: 'di kun mod la myur du ni //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-9: dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsgrub bya //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-10: khro bo che bdag bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gsungs //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-12: de yi 'bras bu bsam mi khyab //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-13: gang zhig lag tu chud gyur pa //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-14: de yi ngan song stong par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-16: bgegs chen yang ni 'jigs par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-17: gang yang nad ni thams cad 'dod //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-19: sdig pa thams cad kun tu 'khrigs //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-21: de dag thams cad med par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-23: thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor bltas na //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-24: sa steng yid ni mchog tu bde //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-25: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-26: ngo mtshar spyan rgyas pa phyed nas //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa blo ldan gyis //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-28: snyan pa yi ni tshig gis gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-29: dpa' bo sems dpa' chen po legs //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-30: rdo rje'i rigs las yang dag 'byung //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-31: byas shes khyod ni sangs rgyas kun //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-32: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sras gcig khyod //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-33: bdag nyid chen po mi g-yo ba'i //
K12D0495_H0465:429b-34: rtog pa 'di ru gsungs pa gang //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-2: de yi lag na dngos grub gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-3: yon tan bsam mi khyab ldan pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-4: bsam gyis mi khyab sgrub pa'i thabs //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-5: ngo mtshar du ma dang ldan pa; ;gsang sngags 'di ni 'chad pa po //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-6: bdag cag kyang ni de bka' nyan //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-7: lha dang lha min bcas pa'i klu //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-8: rgyab phyogs rjes su 'brang ba ni //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-10: sems can thams cad skal bzang du //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-12: bgegs su gyur pa thams cad ni //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-13: sngags pa'i bka' bsgo byed par 'gyur; ;de nas bcom
K12D0495_H0465:430a-14: ldan 'das kyis bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i
K12D0495_H0465:430a-15: rdo rje kun tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me lce
K12D0495_H0465:430a-16: 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
K12D0495_H0465:430a-17: par zhugs so // bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs
K12D0495_H0465:430a-18: ma thag tu de nas re zhig sangs rgyas kyi
K12D0495_H0465:430a-33: kun tu rab tu chem chem mo //
K12D0495_H0465:430a-34: de nas re zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid bgegs thams cad dang /
K12D0495_H0465:430b-0: gang yang kha cig 'di na gdug pa'i sems @430b
K12D0495_H0465:430b-1: dang ldan pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cing blags tshol
K12D0495_H0465:430b-3: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can log par 'dren pa de rnams
K12D0495_H0465:430b-4: rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis
K12D0495_H0465:430b-6: gang yang sangs rgyas chos la ni //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-7: gus pa yis ni skyabs song bas //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-8: gang zhig skye bo de lus la //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-9: sdug bsngal ci yang yod ma yin //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0495_H0465:430b-11: sngar med pa yi bgegs kyi gzugs //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-12: bsgrub bya ba yi cho ga ni //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-13: phyag na rdo rje tshur la nyon //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-14: mi shes pa yis sems bsgribs pas //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-15: rgyud ni mi shes par 'gyur ba //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-16: de ni bgegs kyis zil mnan cing //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-17: 'dir ni sngags la dad ldan na //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-18: sel ba ru ni gyur pa ste //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-19: yangs pa yi ni mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-20: las kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ni //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-21: legs byas nyes byas de bzhin du //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-22: log pa'i rgyal po zil mnan cing //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-23: de dag thams cad mnyes par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-24: log pa'i kun rtog mang po yis //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-25: dmyal bar myur du skye bar 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-26: ltas ngan las kyi 'bras bu kun //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-27: de nas gso sbyong yod ma yin //
K12D0495_H0465:430b-28: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
K12D0495_H0465:430b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom
K12D0495_H0465:430b-30: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-1: sngon med pa'i gzugs su gyur pa /
K12D0495_H0465:431a-2: ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa'i sems can rnams shes rab
K12D0495_H0465:431a-3: chung bas bgegs rnams sngar med pa 'byung ba'i rgyu
K12D0495_H0465:431a-5: de rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir gtso bos bshad du gsol //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0495_H0465:431a-7: phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
K12D0495_H0465:431a-8: pa / bgegs rnams zhags pas bcings pas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-9: sngon gyi las la rag las yin //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-10: ser sna goms pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-11: 'dod pa'i dngos po la gnod pas //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-12: sems kyi rtog pa'i skyon gyis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-13: sngags pa la ni bgegs skye 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-14: de rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-15: sems ni byang chub gtang bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-16: bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig /
K12D0495_H0465:431a-17: thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba'i zom //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-18: gang yang sdig pa cung zad pa //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-19: thog med srid pa'i 'khor lo ni //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-20: byang chub sems kyi mthu yis su //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-21: de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-22: byang chub sems ni sems chen po //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-23: sems kyi nyes pa rnam par spangs //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-24: thog ma med pa'i sdig pa'i skyon //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-25: nags mtshams me yis sreg par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-26: sngags pas sems la mkhas pas na //
K12D0495_H0465:431a-27: las rnams thams cad sreg par 'gyur //

K12D0495_H0465:440a-32: khro bo mi g-yo ba yi sku //
K12D0495_H0465:440a-33: ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar na //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-0: 'jigs pa'i @440b gzugs can bgegs srin po //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-1: de lta de ltar brlag par 'gyur //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-2: kha yi phyag rgya sbyor ldan pas //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-3: sngags pas kun tu sbyar bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-4: 'di ni don yod thogs pa med //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu mchod //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-6: slar yang rdo rje'i rkang pa sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-7: phyag 'tshal thal mo spyi bor sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-8: sngon bzhin rkang pa mnyam byas nas //

K12D0495_H0465:440b-10: g-yas pa dang ni g-yon pa na //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-11: zhags pa ral gri thogs nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-12: rdo rje dor nas yang dag gnas //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-13: g-yon pas yi cha la bzhag /
K12D0495_H0465:440b-14: g-yas pa mtshon cha dang bcas kyang //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-15: zhags pas bkug ste bzhag nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-16: ral gris gzugs brnyan bcad na ni //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-17: tshangs pa'am ni brgya byin yang //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-18: de ma thag tu myur bar gcod //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-19: 'di dang dpal ldan zhags pa bsnams //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-20: ral gri'i phyag rgya sbyar ba yis //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-21: sngags pas sbyar ba tsam gyis ni //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-22: gdug pa thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-23: thal mo btab ste sbyar nas su //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-24: 'khor lo lta bu rab bskor bya //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-25: sngags pas bskor zhing drangs nas ni //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-26: rkang pa sngar bzhin sbyar bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-27: phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-28: phan tshun so sor khu tshur bcing //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-29: gnyis ka'i mdzub mo rtse sbyar te //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-30: rdo rje rtse gcig rnam par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-31: gdug pa kun la gdab pa dang //
K12D0495_H0465:440b-32: 'bigs par yang dag brjod pa yin //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-0: @441a *// bgegs rnams thams cad rlag byed pa'i //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-1: srung ba la sogs rab tu sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-2: lag pa gnyis ni mnyam byas nas //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-3: khu tshur sbyar te bcang bar bya //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-4: gung mo rtse mo sprad de sbyar //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-5: mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-6: gung mo la sbyar rdo rje ni //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-7: phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgya ste //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-8: gdug pa thams cad rlog par byed //
K12D0495_H0465:441a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
K12D0495_H0465:441a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
K12D0495_H0465:441a-11: 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K12D0495_H0465:441a-16: ji snyed ba'i don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa
K12D0495_H0465:441a-17: stobs gnon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po mi bzad pa'i
K12D0495_H0465:441a-18: phyag rgya ji lta ji ltar sgrub pa pos sbyar
K12D0495_H0465:441a-19: pa de lta de ltar dngos grub ster bar byed
K12D0495_H0465:441a-20: pa / bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i khro
K12D0495_H0465:441a-21: bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
K12D0495_H0465:441a-22: 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde
K12D0495_H0465:441a-23: bar bya ba'i phyir bdag kyang bshad par 'tshal lo
K12D0495_H0465:441a-24: pa / // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0495_H0465:441a-26: gang de'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig /
K12D0495_H0465:441a-27: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0495_H0465:441a-28: lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba
K12D0495_H0465:441b-0: thob ste bsam pa thams @441b cad la mnyes gshin
K12D0495_H0465:441b-1: pa'i rol bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
K12D0495_H0465:441b-2: phyag 'tshal nas dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog snang
K12D0495_H0465:441b-3: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
K12D0495_H0465:441b-4: zhugs so // bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma
K12D0495_H0465:441b-5: thag tu de nas re zhig 'jig rten gyi khams
K12D0495_H0465:441b-6: thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te
K12D0495_H0465:441b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi
K12D0495_H0465:441b-8: skus gang bar byas nas phyogs bcur bskor te slar
K12D0495_H0465:441b-9: yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku la zhugs par
K12D0495_H0465:441b-10: zhugs so // gyur / khro bo'i rgyal po chen
K12D0495_H0465:441b-11: po'i sgrub thabs su gyur pa rdzu 'phrul chen po
K12D0495_H0465:441b-12: zhugs so // gyur / rnams nyon cig / lo
K12D0495_H0465:441b-13: 'dab la sogs pa za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas
K12D0495_H0465:441b-14: zhugs so // gyur / rnams nyon cig / pa
K12D0495_H0465:441b-15: bya'o // de nas zhag gsum 'dug nas ras ris
K12D0495_H0465:441b-16: kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te /
K12D0495_H0465:441b-17: de'i mdun du nim pa'i yam shing gi me sbar
K12D0495_H0465:441b-18: te mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po snying
K12D0495_H0465:441b-19: po'i sngags kyis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste
K12D0495_H0465:441b-20: / sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas so //
K12D0495_H0465:441b-21: de la khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i sgrub thabs ni /
K12D0495_H0465:441b-23: dkyil 'khor bris nas ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings te
K12D0495_H0465:441b-24: skyil krung bcas nas ji srid du rig pa 'dzin
K12D0495_H0465:441b-25: par gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:442a-0: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bskal par gnas la 'dod pa'i 'chi @442a *//
K12D0495_H0465:442a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du spyod la /
K12D0495_H0465:442a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing sems can
K12D0495_H0465:442a-4: thams cad kyi don byed do; ;slar yang 'bum phrag
K12D0495_H0465:442a-6: gang 'dod pa'i las rnams thams cad byed do //
K12D0495_H0465:442a-9: nam mkha' nas 'dab chags lhung bar byed do //
K12D0495_H0465:442a-12: zla ba gzas zin pa'i nub mo 'dug nas pa
K12D0495_H0465:442a-13: lci sa la lhung ba dkyil 'khor byas la dri
K12D0495_H0465:442a-14: zhim po'i me tog sil ma bkram ste ras bris
K12D0495_H0465:442a-15: sam / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
K12D0495_H0465:442a-16: glegs bam gyi spyan sngar se'u dang rigs mthun pa'i
K12D0495_H0465:442a-17: mar srang gcig zangs ma'i snod du bcug ste seng
K12D0495_H0465:442a-18: ldeng gi me sbar te gdung zhing bzlas pas dngos
K12D0495_H0465:442a-20: de nas ri'i rtse mor gnas bcas te zas mi za bar bzlas pa 'bum byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:442a-23: 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag gcig bsregs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442a-24: rtsva dur ba mngar gsum gyis btags nas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:442a-25: phyugs ngas ches chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-0: padma rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi @442b dang mar gyis btags te sbyin sreg 'bum byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-1: mchog gsol ba gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-2: rgya mtshor 'gro ba na chu klung gi chu'i nang du zhugs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-4: ji lta ba'i kha dog gi me tog bsregs na /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-5: de lta bu'i kha dog gi gos rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-6: so ba bsregs pas so bang mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-7: nas kyi sbyin sreg gis khyim bdag chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-8: pri yang kus dbang du byed do //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-9: spos shing gis 'khor g-yog mang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:442b-10: mngar gsum gyis btags pa'i bil ba'i 'bras bus sbyin sreg 'bum byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-12: ras ris kyi cho ga ji bzhin pa ni /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-14: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba zhal gcig pa /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-16: na bza' dur smrig mnabs pa /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-17: zur mig gis gzigs pa'i phyag na ral gri dang zhags pa bsnabs pa /
K12D0495_H0465:442b-18: khro gnyer rim par ldan pa'i zhal 'jig rten gsum
K12D0495_H0465:442b-19: 'jigs par mdzad pa dur smrig mnabs pa bri bar
K12D0495_H0465:442b-20: bya'o // de nas rgya mtshor song ste ras bris
K12D0495_H0465:442b-21: bkram nas lus la gos gtsang ma ba gos te
K12D0495_H0465:442b-22: dogs pa med cing lkugs pa slong mo za bas
K12D0495_H0465:443a-0: tha ma'i nyin zhag 'dug nas tsa na ka'i yam shing gis khri phrag gcig @443a *//
K12D0495_H0465:443a-2: mi g-yo ba mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa yang nye bar spyod la /
K12D0495_H0465:443a-3: ting nge 'dzin rnyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443a-4: yang na dur khrod kyi ras la 'phags pa mi
K12D0495_H0465:443a-5: g-yo mgon po bris la bdag nyid kyi khrag gis
K12D0495_H0465:443a-6: spyan phye ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:443a-7: sgrub pa po shar du phyogs te phyin nas ras
K12D0495_H0465:443a-8: bris kha sprod du dgram ste dus gsum du khrus
K12D0495_H0465:443a-9: bya zhing gos rlon pa bgos te lkugs pas 'bum
K12D0495_H0465:443a-11: mar ngo'i tshes brgyad kyi zhag 'dug ste 'byung po
K12D0495_H0465:443a-12: thams cad la gtor ma byin nas ro chen po'i
K12D0495_H0465:443a-13: steng du khri phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:443a-14: de nas ro de'i lus 'gul bar 'gyur te /
K12D0495_H0465:443a-16: de nas kha'i nang du padma kha phye ba'i lte ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443a-17: blangs nas bzung bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing
K12D0495_H0465:443a-18: lha'i gzugs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du spyod do
K12D0495_H0465:443a-19: // yang na ras bris kyi mdun du zla ba
K12D0495_H0465:443a-20: drug tu thun gsum du bzlas shing ji ltar 'byor
K12D0495_H0465:443a-21: pa'i mchod pa byas shing aa ga ru'i bdug pas
K12D0495_H0465:443a-22: // bdugs na / yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443a-23: rgyal mtshan la stong phrag gcig bsngags nas dmag gi sngon du bzung na /
K12D0495_H0465:443b-0: pha rol gyi dmag @443b tshogs g-yul nyes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443b-1: dmag tshogs rengs par 'dod pas sku chen po sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi la phyag bzhi pa /
K12D0495_H0465:443b-3: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung ba /
K12D0495_H0465:443b-4: 'bar ba'i phreng ba dkrigs pas pha rol gyi dpung
K12D0495_H0465:443b-5: bzung ba lta bur bsam pa'am bris nas bstan na
K12D0495_H0465:443b-6: / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443b-7: rtsod par 'dod pas khva ta dang 'ug pa'i sgros sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:443b-9: dgra bo myos par 'dod pas sreg blugs 'bum phrag
K12D0495_H0465:443b-10: sbyin sreg bya'o; ;sbyin sreg byas pas mi g-yo ba'i
K12D0495_H0465:443b-11: mngag gzhug pas 'gul nas bcings te lho phyogs su
K12D0495_H0465:443b-12: khyer nas myos shing khrag tu skyug cing skrag par
K12D0495_H0465:443b-13: dgra'i lus bltas pas rigs rgyud dang bcas pa brlag
K12D0495_H0465:443b-14: par 'gyur ro // mi'i rus pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas btags na /
K12D0495_H0465:443b-15: gang gi ming nas smos pa de'i mod du rims kyi btab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443b-16: nim pa'i 'bras bu dug dang mar khus btags nas sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:443b-17: nyi ma gsum gyis dgra bo brlag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:443b-18: tshva dang 'jim pas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la
K12D0495_H0465:443b-19: myos byed kyi tsher mas btsugs te gtubs shing bcad
K12D0495_H0465:443b-21: de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-1: bo'i ming nas smos shing sal ma ri zhes bya
K12D0495_H0465:444a-2: ba brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pas dgra bo dbul por
K12D0495_H0465:444a-3: 'gyur ro // dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-4: lan tshva'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan byas te bcad nas sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-5: skyes bu chen po nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-6: dzva ti kha 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-7: gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-8: 'khrul byed kyi 'dab mas sbyin sreg byas pas smyo bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-9: lan tshva'i sbyin sreg gis lha'i bu mo yang 'gugs so //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-10: gu gul gyi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-11: ras bris gzhan gyi cho ga 'di yin te /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-12: dbus su bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-13: de'i g-yas su 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-14: g-yon du rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal cung zad 'dzum
K12D0495_H0465:444a-15: pa phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa bri bar bya'o
K12D0495_H0465:444a-16: // de'i spyan sngar 'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas las thams cad byed nus par 'gyur te /
K12D0495_H0465:444a-17: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444a-18: spyan gyi phyag rgya bcings te khros pas yi ge
K12D0495_H0465:444a-19: h'um la sogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sngags bzlas pas
K12D0495_H0465:444a-20: dgra bo gdon chen pos 'dzin pa'am nges par brlag
K12D0495_H0465:444a-21: par 'gyur ro // dur khrod kyi thal ba la
K12D0495_H0465:444a-22: lan 'bum bzlas nas gang la sbyin pa de bran
K12D0495_H0465:444b-1: wang la lan bdun bzlas nas thig le byas pas
K12D0495_H0465:444b-2: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing mi mthong
K12D0495_H0465:444b-4: ro // bgegs thams cad dang log par 'dren pa
K12D0495_H0465:444b-5: la sogs pa 'bar bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:444b-6: bdag nyid la bkod nas dpag tshad brgya nas kyang tshangs pa dang srin po grol bar byed do //
K12D0495_H0465:444b-7: sbrul nag pos zin pa zla ba drug nas mnan
K12D0495_H0465:444b-8: par 'dod na; khros pas ral gri'i phyag rgya bris
K12D0495_H0465:444b-9: la lto 'phye chen po'i rigs ldan gyis bskor te
K12D0495_H0465:444b-10: / de nas ral gri la stong phrag gcig mngon
K12D0495_H0465:444b-11: par bsngags nas dbus su de lta bur 'bar ba
K12D0495_H0465:444b-13: de nad pa la bstan na nges par 'jug go /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-14: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba spyan gcig pa'i snying po thun gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-16: dben pa'i sa phyogs su zan gyi chang bu byin na /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-17: mchog chen po stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-18: snying po'i phyag rgya bcings te khros pas yi ge h'um bzlas na sbyin dral bar byed do //
K12D0495_H0465:444b-19: tsher ma ske tshes btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-20: rlung gi char pa gtun shing ltar 'jog go /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-21: sgrub pa po la srung ba chen po byed do //
K12D0495_H0465:444b-22: mi rnams rkang pa g-yon pa mnan pas bsgrubs na /
K12D0495_H0465:444b-24: lha dang mi rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas bcad na /
K12D0495_H0465:445a-0: lha dang mi thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas de lcags kyi @445a *//
K12D0495_H0465:445a-3: de nas 'ching bar 'dod par gyur na /
K12D0495_H0465:445a-4: skud pa ser po la mngon par bsngags te gzugs de dkris na /
K12D0495_H0465:445a-7: lha la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas steng du spang leb kyis mnan na btsir bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:445a-9: mi la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te re'u slud
K12D0495_H0465:445a-10: bus brabs na ngu zhing 'ongs nas bka' bsgo ba
K12D0495_H0465:445a-12: lha dang mi thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te
K12D0495_H0465:445a-13: spang leb la sogs pas mnan na gnon par 'gyur
K12D0495_H0465:445a-14: ro // de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul
K12D0495_H0465:445a-15: chen po 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de
K12D0495_H0465:445a-16: lta de ltar las gzhan ngo mtshar che ba yang
K12D0495_H0465:445a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0495_H0465:445a-19: phyag na rdo rjes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i
K12D0495_H0465:445a-21: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0495_H0465:445a-22: sarba bi shva mu khe bhya:/
K12D0495_H0465:445a-24: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um tr'at ma h'a tsanda aa tsa la k'a na h'um h'um h'um/
K12D0495_H0465:445a-26: ta th'a ga t'a dzny'am sma ra h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0495_H0465:445a-27: de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang khro bo
K12D0495_H0465:445a-28: chen po thogs pa med pa'i mchog gi snying po
K12D0495_H0465:445a-29: dpa' bo gcig pa bka' stsal pa /
