K12D0495_H0465:454b-15: 'gyur ro // de ltar 'khor lo dang mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams dang /
K12D0495_H0465:454b-18: tshangs skud la sogs pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:454b-19: snga ma bzhin du dngos grub gsum 'byung ngo //
K12D0495_H0465:454b-20: de nas nor sgrub par 'dod na /
K12D0495_H0465:454b-21: seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams zho dang mar gyis sbags nas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:454b-23: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'gram du song nas tsandan gyis
K12D0495_H0465:454b-24: sbags pa'i padma rnams stong phrag brgyad cu chu bo
K12D0495_H0465:454b-25: la bskur na / padma'i phung po dang mnyam pa'i nor thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:454b-26: lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-0: aa ga ru'i yam shing rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar @455a *//
K12D0495_H0465:455a-1: gyis btags nas bsreg blugs byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-2: gsum po des btags pa'i 'bras bsregs na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-4: gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-5: mngar gsum gyis btags pa'i gu gul gyi ril bus sreg blugs bsregs pas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-6: mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-7: gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-8: rgyal po la yungs kar gyi sreg blugs byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-10: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi 'gram du song nas padma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-11: dpal 'dus nas nor stsol ba'am yul phyogs gcig pa'i rgyal srid ster ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-12: de nas 'bum phrag gsum byas nas byin na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-13: sa steng gi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-15: 'dzam bu gling gi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-16: lha ma yin gyi bu ga'i sgor ras ris bzhag nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na /
K12D0495_H0465:455a-18: dogs pa med par zhugs na bcud kyis len la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-19: de nas de nyid du gnas na khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K12D0495_H0465:455a-20: yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te dz'a ti'i me
K12D0495_H0465:455a-21: tog stong phrag brgyad du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
K12D0495_H0465:455a-22: kyi mthe bor reg par bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:455b-0: ji srid du zhabs kyi mthe bong las 'od zer byung @455b gi bar du btags na /
K12D0495_H0465:455b-1: sgrub pa po'i lus de ma thag tu mi snang zhing dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0495_H0465:455b-2: 'khor dang bcas pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0495_H0465:455b-3: bskal par gnas so; ;sa la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bris te /
K12D0495_H0465:455b-4: de'i steng du 'dug nas stong phrag brgya bzlas nas gzhi gar gnas padmar gnas te /
K12D0495_H0465:455b-5: 'khor stong dang ldan pa bskal par gnas so //
K12D0495_H0465:455b-6: de nas gtor blang bar 'dod na /
K12D0495_H0465:455b-7: gang na gter yod pa de ru bum pa skud
K12D0495_H0465:455b-8: pa nag pos dkris la tsandan gyis byugs la chus
K12D0495_H0465:455b-9: bkang ste stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas
K12D0495_H0465:455b-11: sa de gas nas chus sa la gtor la khru gang tsam sa la brkos te blang bar bya'o //
K12D0495_H0465:455b-13: grog mkhar gyi sa la seng+ge byas la gi wang
K12D0495_H0465:455b-14: gis byugs la dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste mchod pa
K12D0495_H0465:455b-15: chen po byas la ji srid du g-yo ba'i bar
K12D0495_H0465:455b-16: du bzlas na seng+ger 'gyur te rgyab tu zhon pas
K12D0495_H0465:455b-17: skra li ba 'khyil bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snga
K12D0495_H0465:455b-18: ltas thob nas lo khri phrag gcig tu 'tsho'o //
K12D0495_H0465:455b-20: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa gsungs pa'i cho ga 'di bsgrubs na /
K12D0495_H0465:455b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas
K12D0495_H0465:455b-24: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad
K12D0495_H0465:455b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstong
K12D0495_H0465:455b-26: de rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs nas
K12D0495_H0465:456a-1: 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi g-yo
K12D0495_H0465:456a-2: ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dpag
K12D0495_H0465:456a-3: tu med pas pha rol gnon pas 'dul bar gsungs
K12D0495_H0465:456a-4: pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0495_H0465:456a-5: mi nyag rgyal po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi
K12D0495_H0465:456a-6: mkhan po au pa shma rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas
K12D0495_H0465:456a-7: lo ts'a ba glan dge slong dharma blo gros kyis
K12D0495_H0465:456a-8: bsgyur cing zhus te dge slong yon tan rdo rjes
K12D0495_H0465:456a-10: phyis su'ang chos kyi rgyal po bkra shis rab brtan dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul ba bzhin /
K12D0495_H0465:456a-11: lo tstsha ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya'i
K12D0495_H0465:456a-12: dpe la legs par gtugs te gtan la phab pa
K12D0495_H0465:456a-13: dang / slar yang mi'i dbang po chen po bkra
K12D0495_H0465:456a-14: shis rab brtan sog po 'phags kyi zhal snga nas
K12D0495_H0465:456a-15: kyi sku ring la dge slong a'a nanda mang+ga lam
K12D0495_H0465:456a-16: gyis dpal 'khor sde chen gyi gtsug lag khang du
K12D0495_H0465:456a-17: pi kra ma la sh'i la'i gtsug lag gi rgya
K12D0495_H0465:456a-18: dpe la gtugs nas mi 'chos su mi rung ba
